name: Sea Creeps
description:
Sea Creeps  by Milai Swan

You play as a soviet Diver tasked with retrieving probes in the dark depths of the arctic. This game takes about 8 minutes to beat and was Made in RPGMAKER MV for  Dread XP's Dredge the Depth's 2021.

Plugins Used: 

Yanfly - https://yanflyengineplugins.itch.io/yanfly-engine-plugins-full-collection

FallenAngel- https://fallenangelolivia.itch.io/animated-pictures

CutieVirus- https://cutievirus.itch.io/mv3d
